comments:
OCLModelConstraint creates Query object for OCL expression but does not set 
extentMap before evaluation. This causes NPE in case that '.allInstances()' operation is used.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.EvaluationVisitorImpl.visitOperationCallExp(EvaluationVisitorImpl.java:1129)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.OperationCallExpImpl.accept(OperationCallExpImpl.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.EvaluationVisitorImpl.visitOperationCallExp(EvaluationVisitorImpl.java:349)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.OperationCallExpImpl.accept(OperationCallExpImpl.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.EvaluationVisitorImpl.visitOperationCallExp(EvaluationVisitorImpl.java:498)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.OperationCallExpImpl.accept(OperationCallExpImpl.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.EvaluationVisitorImpl.visitOperationCallExp(EvaluationVisitorImpl.java:498)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.OperationCallExpImpl.accept(OperationCallExpImpl.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.EvaluationVisitorImpl.visitOperationCallExp(EvaluationVisitorImpl.java:498)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.expressions.impl.OperationCallExpImpl.accept(OperationCallExpImpl.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.query.impl.QueryImpl.evaluate(QueryImpl.java:224)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ocl.query.impl.QueryImpl.check(QueryImpl.java:255)
	at org.eclipse.emf.validation.internal.ocl.OCLModelConstraint.validate(OCLModelConstraint.java:103)
	at org.eclipse.emf.validation.xml.XmlConstraintProvider$ConstraintProxy.validate(XmlConstraintProvider.java:148)
This will be fixed indirectly by Bug 146378, which will update the Query implementation to implicitly use the lazy extent-map.
This is fixed indirectly by the resolution of the dependent bug.
